org.dejava.component.util.validation.annotation

Annotation Type Validations


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Validations
    Define validations to be executed in a object field. The validations are defined using a set of ValidationMethod annotations.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean recursiveValidation
      If the validation must be invoked recursively for the object(s) in the annotated field.
      ValidationMethod[] validationMethods
      Validations for the annotated field.

    • Element Detail

      • validationMethods

        public abstract ValidationMethod[] validationMethods
        Validations for the annotated field.
        Default:
        {}

      • recursiveValidation

        public abstract boolean recursiveValidation
        If the validation must be invoked recursively for the object(s) in the annotated field.
        Default:
        false
